local_intent: Close the gripper with nominal force to secure the brown object, then verify grasp stability and object possession.
assumptions: End-effector is already aligned at the grasp pose around the brown object
Object is between the gripper fingers prior to closure
coherence_with_global: Implements the CloseGripper step (force=20, timeout=1000) followed by IsGraspStable and ObjectInGripper checks, matching the global sequence verification after grasp execution.
